about_the_game:
New spicy R-rated pictures of Cuties Hacked girls. Spice up your hack of Cutie's phones, and enjoy!
Amelia, Monique, Cypher, and the rest of the girls from Cuties Hacked: oh no someone stole my photos game has some additional and very very naughty pictures on their phones.

Will you be able to uncover them?

Twelve new levels, and twelve new pictures to uncover.
This DLC unlocks the final part of the grand Cutie hack.

content_descriptors.notes: Sex, Sexual Acts, Nudity, Explicit Nudity.

fullgame.name: Cuties Hacked: Oh no someone stole my photos!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Cuties Hacked - Hentai DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
